text: Yamaichi Securities Co., Ltd. was a Japanese securities trading firm. The company announced it could cease its operations on 24 November 1997 and had eventually been declared bankrupt by the Tokyo District Court on 2 June 1999. Category:1897 establishments Category:1890s establishments in Asia Category:1999 disestablishments in Japan Category:Defunct companies Category:Japanese financial companies
title: Yamaichi Securities
